ai-tha-ap134:1.1_0: “A river from the bank of the river Aciravatī,
ai-tha-ap134:1.3_0: I’ve been searching for the tree;
ai-tha-ap134:1.4_0: and he saw the world speedless.
ai-tha-ap134:2.3_0: I bowed down to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap134:3.1_0: with the knowledge master, the goal
ai-tha-ap134:3.3_0: that knowledge has been given up as a master,
ai-tha-ap134:4.1_0: having come to the end of the fetters,
ai-tha-ap134:5.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap134:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap134:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap134:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumedhā.
ai-tha-ap134:9.1_0: For the senior mendicants who are easy to see.
